long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to send HTTP POST requests to the tab origin site on press or using a Ctrl+Shift+Z shortcut. Particularly useful for developers.

An example use case might be to record open telemetry data, where you can configure both a start and end http request, and begin recording with ease.
